item.title: Building out a mini iOS Manga App
item.description:
Finally getting back into the building iOS apps after a ~2 year hiatus. It’s been awhile since I built something outside of work. I figured this would be a good way to document my journmey plus build something to get back into iOS with goal of pursuing it as my next step in my career.

Things I learned:

  • Navigation and TabViews: For some odd reason, navigation stack and tabviews didn’t play well together. I had to end up adding a navigation stack to each tabview to get it to work properly with its navigation title. I also had the issue with applying a universal app background color; it seemed to only work in each “TabItem” view
